message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While that price doesn't quite reflect the value I believe this product holds, I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $1,250,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $1,150,000?
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $1,150,000.  My final offer is $1,200,000.  I believe this is a fair and final offer considering the value this product will bring you.
I understand that you're trying to make a fair deal, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $1,100,000?
